t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry ...
s: June 4, 2024 - Image guidelines: Your brand name must be clearly visible and permanently affixed to your products or packaging in the images you provide during enrollment. Permanently affixed brand names are typically applied during production using methods like printing, sewing, laser etching, or engraving.
